extension.name: plg_system_deploytools
extension.author: Techjoomla
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: Tools to help simplify Joomla website deployments

field.name: version_no
field.label: Version Number
field.description: Use the version number to denote the version your website is in

field.name: version_filename
field.label: Version Filename
field.description: If you want the plugin to pick up the version number from a file, specify the file name/path. This is relative to Joomla root. Note that you will need to keep the above field empty to use this option.

field.name: process_css
field.description: If set to yes, will append the version number to all CSS files loaded on the site
field.label: Process CSS Files

field.name: process_js
field.description: If set to yes, will append the version number to all javascript files loaded on the site
field.label: Process JS Files

field.name: remove_external_files
field.label: Remove External JS
field.description: If set to yes, stop the external JS files from loading. CAUTION: This may break your site.
